oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Asher Sizemore & Little Jimmie - #6
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Radio program '#6' featuring Asher Sizemore, Little Jimmie Sizemore, Nancy Louise Sizemore, Little Cowboy Joe Sizemore, and Ordie Day (accordion). Circa 1950.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Asher Sizemore; Little Cowboy Joe Sizemore; Ordie Day; Nancy Louise Sizemore; Little Jimmie Sizemore
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test band -- Theme -- Opening statement (Asher Sizemore) -- Live And Let Live -- Asher Sizemore introduces Little Cowboy Joe -- Roly Poly (Little Cowboy Joe Sizemore) -- Asher Sizemore introduces Nancy Louise -- Go Out And Find Somebody New (Nancy Louise Sizemore) -- Asher Sizemore introduces Ordie Day -- Sweet Georgia Brown (Ordie Day accordion) -- Asher Sizemore introduces Little Jimmie -- I Can't Go On This Way (Little Jimmie Sizemore) -- Asher Sizemore introduces the next song -- How Beautiful Heaven Must Be
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Sizemore, Asher; Sizemore, Little Jimmie, 1928-; Sizemore, Little Cowboy Joe; Sizemore, Nancy Louise; Day, Ordie
